title: Classic Herb-Roasted Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Pat chicken breast dry and season generously with salt and pepper.
Mince garlic and mix with olive oil and chopped herbs.
Rub the herb mixture all over the chicken breast.
Place in a baking dish and roast for 20-25 minutes until internal temperature reaches 165°F.
Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing and serving.

title: Fresh Garden Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions until al dente.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add sliced bell peppers and carrots, cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add broccoli florets and minced garlic, cook for 2-3 minutes more.
Drain pasta and add to the skillet with vegetables.
Toss everything together with grated Parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.

title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Warm 4 cups of vegetable broth in a separate pot and keep on low heat.
Sauté diced onion in 2 tbsp butter until translucent, about 3 minutes.
Add minced garlic and sliced mushrooms, cook until mushrooms are golden.
Add rice and stir for 2 minutes until grains are coated and slightly toasted.
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed.
Continue adding broth and stirring for 20-25 minutes until rice is creamy.
Stir in remaining butter and Parmesan cheese before serving.

title: Mediterranean Salmon Bowl
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions and set aside.
Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook salmon for 4-5 minutes per side until flaky and cooked through.
In the same pan, quickly sauté spinach until wilted.
Serve salmon over rice with sautéed spinach and cherry tomatoes.
Drizzle with remaining olive oil and lemon juice.

title: Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions.
Heat olive oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add ground beef and cook, breaking up with a spoon, until browned.
Add sliced onions and bell peppers, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add minced garlic and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately over steamed rice.

title: Spinach and Cheese Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat.
Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes.
Pour beaten eggs over the spinach in the pan.
Let eggs set on the bottom for 2-3 minutes without stirring.
Sprinkle cheese over half of the omelette.
Fold omelette in half and slide onto plate. Serve immediately.
